input_email_body:
Subject: Problem with Invoice and Payment Difference Detected

Hello customer support, I am contacting you to report a discrepancy I found on my recent bill My name is Sophia Rossi.. By cross-checking my payment history, I suspect a mistake might have led to an invoice mismatch. I have double-checked my payments and believe there could be an error. Please investigate this and provide assistance in resolving it. I thank you for your time and support in addressing this matter. You can reach me at janesmith@company.com.
